ygData.messageBody:
Er, hot topic. Not quite sure what a hot toping is.


-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]
Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 11:36 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Kedge keep, tinkered items?


From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>

Sorry, off topic, but with Kedge Keep being a hot toping, I was wondering if
anyone knows anything about the new tinkered item that lets you breathe
underwater? i.e. What's it called? Does it have charges? Do you have to
wear it? etc. . .


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 49 Bard
Erollisi Marr

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
